text: waelmu 'ana bayn azhrkm rswl allah ftadbu meh; fa'iinah 'aelam minkum bima yuslih lkm, yurid bikum alkhyr, waqad turidun li'anfusikum min alsharu walmdrt ma la ywafqkm alrasul elyh, law yutieukum fi kathir min al'amr mimaa tkhtarwnh lada dhlk 'iilaa mshqtkm, wlkn allah habab 'iilaykum al'iiman whssanh fi qlwbkm, famntm, wkrrah 'iilaykum alkfr biallah walkhrwj ean taeth, wmesytah, 'uwlayik almtsfwn bhdhh alsfat hum alraashidun alsalkwn tariq alhq
